page.title: 16HATTERSLEY
page.content: Landscape:- The landscape of this area falls into two distinct categories , Housing and Rough Fenced land. The Pasture land comprises of grassed fields, through which runs a railway line. Rough immature woodland and a small area of common land take up about 2% eace pasture! Housing :- Housing takes up some 20% of the total area. The main design of the property comprises of a pleasant variety of terraced dwellings interspersed with grass verges and trees. Seven 12 storey tower blocks are dotted throughout the area but they blend in rather well with the surroundings
